action.action-desc: Mr. Trott introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To clarify that nonprofit organizations may accept donated mortgage appraisals, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Housing Opportunities Made Easier Act or the HOME Act.

section.header: Exemption from Truth in Lending Act
section.text: Section 129E(i) of the Truth in Lending Act (15 U.S.C. 1639e(i)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Rule of construction related to appraisal donations
paragraph.text: For purposes of paragraph (1), if a fee appraiser voluntarily donates appraisal services to an organization described in section 170(c)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, such voluntary donation shall be deemed customary and reasonable.
